first.title: You are covered.
first.body: All risk insurance, don't worry! We provide SURA insurance to guarantee a safe trip.

second.title: Customer support 24/7.
second.body: Relax, customer support and roadside assistance available at all hours every day, just a click away.

third.title: Infinite options.
third.body: Choose from thousands models you won't find nowehere else. Pick it up wherever you wish.

first.title: Arrive and climb on your ATUA
first.body: Easy and simple. Reserve your ATUA from the app, reach the ATUA point and pick up your vehicle.

second.title: Between users
second.body: Rent straight from owners. Pact when and where to pick up.

first.title: Find your perfect car
first.body: Type a location and a date and explore vehicles from local hosts.

second.title: Book your trip
second.body: Book from the app, choose from our concessionaires.

third.title: Your ATUA will be waiting
third.body: Arrive at your destination, find the ATUA point and pick it up.

rent_your_car_section.title: Rent your car, earn extra money.
rent_your_car_section.body: Cover monthly payments of your car or just earn extra money by sharing your car in ATUA when not in use.

calculator_section.title: Calculate how much can you earn with your car.
